full_text: Dress up your desk with a Pom Pom Gnome who is ready to get to the point! Just Write Gnome was designed to celebrate the back-to-school season but is also a great way to celebrate a new job, give to your favorite writer, or add some flair to your craft room. This pattern includes instructions for the knitted hat, pom pom, i-cord legs, and assembly. A link to download the pattern will be emailed to you after you check out. MATERIALS NEEDED Pom Pom: 55 y (42 m) worsted weight yarn 4” diameter pom pom maker Scrap yarn Scissors Hat: 38 y (35 m) worsted weight yarn in MC (we used Ewe Ewe Yarn’s Wooly Worsted in Saffron), 1 y (1 m) of CC1 (we used Ewe Ewe Yarn’s Wooly Worsted in Vanilla), and less than 1 y (1m) of CC2 (we used Ewe Ewe Yarn’s Wooly Worsted in Charcoal) US 3 (3.25 mm) double pointed needles BOR marker 2 stitch markers Finishing: Wooden Gnome Nose Small amount of stuffing Darning needle Hot glue gun + glue
name: Ravelry: Just Write Gnome pattern by Billy and Baa
